resources.string:
ॐ तत् सत्। Shall we update your Sanskrit Dictionary files?

 This program downloads latest dictionary files from the internet, and stores it in the SDCARD/dictdata folder, for Stardict apps to use. This will take some time. We use the index maintained by the stardict-sanskrit project (See: https://github.com/vvasuki/stardict-sanskrit https://sites.google.com/site/sanskritcode/ ). 
!!!Don't navigate away or we'll need to restart!!!
!!!Don\'t navigate away or we\'ll need to restart!!!
We\'re done!! Get a stardict-compatible dictionary app (eg: Goldendict paid, ColorDict), if you don\'t already have one. Then reindex all your dictionaries.
\n Do you want to try again?
